formatted_address: 1 Orchard Spring Ln, Level 5 Tourism Court, Singapore 247729
name: SHATEC Orchard

reviews.text:
This is a new branch with two spacious studios. Each studio is equipped with home electronic appliances so students could replicate the recipes at their own homes.

It has a view of the courtyard and the road outside the building.

It is a brand new campus. Visitors could sit at the lounge when querying staff for the upcoming classes.

Visitors need to register in advance to obtain the QR code. There is a security counter at level 1.

It is within walking distance of Orchard Boulevard MRT (TEL) aka brown line.

vicinity: 1 Orchard Spring Lane, Level 5 Tourism Court
